comment:
* Used to pass in the required information for updating an enterprise drawable resource using
 * {@link DevicePolicyResourcesManager#setDrawables}.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public String getDrawableId()
methods.comment: * Returns the ID of the drawable to update.

methods.name: public String getDrawableStyle()
methods.comment: * Returns the style of the drawable to update

methods.name: public String getDrawableSource()
methods.comment: * Returns the source of the drawable to update.

methods.name: public int getResourceIdInCallingPackage()
methods.comment:
* Returns the ID of the drawable resource in the calling package to use as an updated
     * resource.

methods.name: public ParcelableResource getResource()
methods.comment:
* Returns the {@link ParcelableResource} of the drawable.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
